item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "Love is so short, forgetting is so long." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Pablo Neruda
item.description: "I can write the saddest poem of all tonight. I loved her, and sometimes she loved me too." -- Pablo Neruda

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Anonymous
item.description: "Love is patient, love is kind. It does not envy, it does not boast, it is not proud. It is not rude, it is not self-seeking, it is not easily angered, it keeps no record of wrongs. Love does not delight in evil but rejoices with the truth. It always protects, always trusts, always hopes, always perseveres." -- Anonymous

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Your task is not to seek for love, but merely to seek and find all the barriers within yourself that you have built against it." -- Rumi

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Vincent Van Gogh
item.description: "It is good to love many things, for therein lies the true strength, and whosoever loves much performs much, and can accomplish much, and what is done in love is well done." -- Vincent Van Gogh

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Richard Rodgers
item.description: "Do I love you because you're beautiful, or are you beautiful because I love you?" -- Richard Rodgers

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Vincent Van Gogh
item.description: "I always think that the best way to know God is to love many things." -- Vincent Van Gogh

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Let the beauty we love be what we do. There are hundreds of ways to kneel and kiss the ground." -- Rumi

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Lord Byron
item.description: "In secret we met - In silence I grieve, That thy heart could forget, Thy spirit deceive. If I should meet thee After long years, How should I greet thee? - With silence and tears" -- Lord Byron

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "When I am with you, we stay up all night. When you're not here, I can't go to sleep. Praise God for those two insomnias! And the difference between them." -- Rumi

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "In your light I learn how to love. In your beauty, how to make poems. You dance inside my chest where no-one sees you, but sometimes I do, and that sight becomes this art." -- Rumi

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "Let yourself be drawn by the stronger pull of that which you truly love." -- Rumi

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "A thousand half-loves must be forsaken to take one whole heart home." -- Rumi

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "In real life, love has to be possible. Even if it is not returned right away, love can only survive when the hope exists that you will be able to win over the person you desire." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Rumi
item.description: "This is love: to fly toward a secret sky, to cause a hundred veils to fall each moment. First to let go of life. Finally, to take a step without feet." -- Rumi

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Ambrose Bierce
item.description: "Love, n. A temporary insanity curable by marriage." -- Ambrose Bierce

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by William Blake
item.description: "For all eternity, I forgive you and you forgive me." -- William Blake

item.title: Ankhee add a quote by Dante Alighieri
item.description:
"Amor, ch'al cor gentile ratto s'apprende prese costui de la bella persona che mi fu tolta; e 'l modo ancor m'offende.
Amor, che a nullo amato amar perdona, Mi prese del costui piacer sì forte, Che, come vedi, ancor non m'abbandona..."
"Love, which quickly arrests the gentle heart, Seized him with my beautiful form That was taken from me, in a manner which still grieves me.
Love, which pardons no beloved from loving, took me so strongly with delight in him That, as you see, it still abandons me not..." -- Dante Alighieri
